from unittest import TestCase
from symbolic_music.complete_dataset import DatasetCreator
from pathlib import Path

class TestDatasetCreator(TestCase):
    def test_parse_file(self):
        creator = DatasetCreator()

            r'C:\Users\HEV7RNG\Documents\data\Yale corpus\ElvisDownload-20190813-123713\Casadesus-Henri\Viola-Concerto-in-B-Minor\Allegro\Viola-Concerto-in-B-Minor_Allegro_Casadesus-Henri_file1.mid')
        creator.parse_file(midi_file)

        event_list = creator.parse_file(midi_file)
